entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,297Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 19

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.

entry.title: First Time? I Can Tell.
entry.summary:
Author: pleatednpleading

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,998Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: Damian Wayne’s first time. When asked, he would fumble—for once in his life—and sputter, face an embarrassingly nervous shade of pink. His hands would tremble ever so slightly.He was fifteen, a boy with a crush he would never admit. Not only were crushes practically a one way ticket to distraction, which would heavily displease Batman—but this girl was older. Not by much, he rationalizes, just enough to make him keep the story to himself.

entry.title: The robin and the jellyfish
entry.summary:
Author: Bellies_wellies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,012Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 31

Summary: After defeating Gaea, Pandora Jackson, younger sister of Percy, returns to her quote-on-quote “normal life” at Gotham Academy. Going through the normal teenage angst mixed with serious PTSD and stuck-up rich kids, she’s got enough problems to deal with. So having Damian Wayne, her “mutually beneficial acquaintance,” walk in on her fighting a monster—and him being able to see it—causes a whole lot more problems. Nothing in life has ever been easy, but it’d be nice to catch some sort of a break. Will she remain just acquaintances with Damian? Will he share his secret and traumas? Or will their tentative friendship end with the new challenges thrown their way? (Title is subject to change cause I suck at naming things lol)

entry.summary:
Author: Kirbygum

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,092Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 92
